narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Youth and Family Alternatives, Inc. is a Community/Behavioral Health provider based in New Port Richey, FL. From 2021-07 through 2024-05, this provider received $469K in Medicaid payments across 8K claims serving 3K beneficiaries, billing 3 distinct procedure codes.

narrative.title: Key Findings
items: 90% of billing is concentrated in H2019 (H2019), indicating significant specialization in this service.
Spending more than doubled from $23K in 2021 to $77K in 2024 (232% growth).
Saw a 6.7× spike in 2022 ($23K → $156K), a sharp year-over-year increase.
